ingredients.raw: 3 tablespoons instant coffee + 3 tablespoons boiling water
1 cup semi-sweet melted chocolate or semi-sweet chocolate chips

expected.item: semi-sweet melted chocolate or semi-sweet chocolate chips

ingredients.raw: 3 cups of chocolate crispy rice cereal (like Cocoa Rice Krispies, Cocoa Pebbles or Cap'N'Crunch)

expected.item: chocolate crispy rice cereal (like Cocoa Rice Krispies, Cocoa Pebbles or Cap'N'Crunch)

ingredients.raw: 1 quart or 5 cups of no churn vanilla ice cream ((or use your favorite brand), softened)

expected.item: no churn vanilla ice cream (or use your favorite brand)
